I'm trying to understand the work that would need to be done to enable https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/1139

It seems like the biggest problem to solve is making sure that the referenced rlib is compatible with the current compilation (compiler version, flags, etc.) - perhaps the incremental build info can be used?

Other than that, there needs to be some syntax in cargo.toml to specify the dependency, and then Cargo needs to forward this via the --extern option to rustc.

Am I missing anything?

It seems like the biggest problem to solve is making sure that the referenced rlib is compatible with the current compilation (compiler version, flags, etc.) - perhaps the incremental build info can be used?

Rustc already knows this itself. It will give you an error when a library isn't compatible.
